title: The Never Ending Circle
description: Hungarian poet, R L Foster, takes you on a journey of love and life in this short collection of her personal poem's. Thought provoking, honest and sometimes vulnerable, she wrote the words many are afraid to say. Her studies of politics and philosophy come through in many of her works, each poem is a reflection of a certain part of her life which we can all relate to.
author: R.L. Foster
